What Chrysler delivered last year, on both the product and financial fronts, surpassed many expectations, said Chrysler chief executive Sergio Marchionne . "However, our job is not yet done. We know there's a lot of doubt about that. Carmelo Anthony scored 28 points in his return from a 15-game suspension for fighting and Allen Iverson added 23 in the Denver Nuggets' 115-98 rout of the Memphis Grizzlies. The two are out to prove two superstars can coexist.

Eric Schmidt will continue to work for Google, assuming the role of Executive Chairman. By elevating me and having Larry running things day to day, we think this will produce even better results for the corporation, Eric Schmidt said on Thursday's earnings call. a blog post, Eric Schmidt said the management change arose out of a discussion about simplifying Google's management structure and streamlining its decision making process.
